name: Help Me Escape! The Puzzle Maker's Office
description: A Virtual Text Message Escape Room Adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTW660+ or AMD Radeon Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970 + Or AMD Radeon Equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
